nodes.text: Galliwig's Cantina was owned and run by the Human male known as Galliwig. The cantina included corner booths, and was known for playing music that offended the ears of some of the clientèle. During the Galactic Civil War, the Twi'lek free-trader Loh'khar the Finder used the cantina to conduct business transactions in, sitting in the same booth so that his regular customers could find him easily. In the cantina, Loh'khar acquired three Turazza eggs during a business deal; the eggs hatched into three sisterswhom the Twi'lek named Rizzal, Vizzal, and Nizzal.

Galliwig's cantina appeared in the short text story Turazza Eggs by Peter M. Schweighofer, which appeared in The DarkStryder Campaign published by West End Games in 1995. The story served as a backstory showing how Loh'khar had acquired the three Turazza sisters who served him.
